channel.title: [RandQm] Forgotten Warriors - Revolution of gameplay
channel.description:
[ul][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/KiO1hec.png[/img]
[font=arial][b]With Forgotten Warriors I'm bringing you an unseen rsps gameplay experience.[/b][/font] [/center]
[i]I'm leaving all the text behind since nobody cares anyways. Here's in short what the game should become.[/i]
[list] [li][b]At login you have to chose a character you wish to play with. With the character comes a certain skin (the worn items) as well as unique stats.[/b] [/li] [li][b]After chosing a champion you will be added to a team, the teams are recognized by the color of their capes.[/b] [/li] [li][b]Combat is similar to MOBA combat if you ever played MOBAgames.[/b] - You don't hit randomly anymore but have a static damage. - Armor of an opponent will lower your damage, but you can help yourself with armor penetration on that. - Some items will give you extra health while others will give you damage, attack speed etc. - Lifesteal will return a % of your applied damage into health - critical chance gives you a % of chance to hit 200%, this can be increase with critical damage items. - black chance gives you a % of blocking an opponents attack completely. - etc... [/li] [li][b]Instead of all items you are wearing, the items you are carrying in your inventory will be the ones that count on calculating your combat bonuses.[/b] This opens more opportunities to players. Only using what the player is wearing limits you a lot, e.g. you can only be wearing one weapon while if you like only stacking damage you can have in theory 28 weapons. Of course that wouldn't be the smartest thing since you wouldn't have any sustain. [/li] [li][b]While playing you gain gold, some items can increase the speed you gain gold. Monster and player kills will give you gold as well.[/b] [/li] [li][b]There are many big monsters that only can be beaten with multiple players, but gives big rewards as well.[/b] [/li] [li][b]Another thing for combat is the opportunity to duel a player wherever you are. The duel is save so you'll just return to where you started the duel upon death or win.[/b] [/li] [li][b]And as last there will be team-minigames with objectives[/b] [/li] [/list]
The main things are done at this time, items with bonuses are working, but I also want to add special effects to bring some more fun to the game, as well as giving the player a reason to seriously think about what item to buy.
Shops have been programmed, npc managing has been finished as well and the base structures for champions are done as well.
[b]Media:[/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/L9RCHYt.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/EhStc8J.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/6Tozh4S.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/r5fSrtA.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/GXaiFOH.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Mfd6exB.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/cQMijAL.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/CJQDHuK.png[/img][/ul]

item.title: [RandQm] Forgotten Warriors - Revolution of gameplay
item.dc:creator: @Angel_Carlos Angel Carlos
item.description:
@Angel_Carlos wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:1, topic:517734”][ul][center]

[font=arial]With Forgotten Warriors I’m bringing you an unseen rsps gameplay experience.[/font]
[/center]

I’m leaving all the text behind since nobody cares anyways.
Here’s in short what the game should become.

[list]
[li]At login you have to chose a character you wish to play with. With the character comes a certain skin (the worn items)
as well as unique stats.
[/li]
[li]After chosing a champion you will be added to a team, the teams are recognized by the color of their capes.
[/li]
[li]Combat is similar to MOBA combat if you ever played MOBAgames.

  • You don’t hit randomly anymore but have a static damage.
  • Armor of an opponent will lower your damage, but you can help yourself with armor penetration on that.
  • Some items will give you extra health while others will give you damage, attack speed etc.
  • Lifesteal will return a % of your applied damage into health
  • critical chance gives you a % of chance to hit 200%, this can be increase with critical damage items.
  • black chance gives you a % of blocking an opponents attack completely.
  • etc…
    [/li]
    [li]Instead of all items you are wearing, the items you are carrying in your inventory will be the ones that count on calculating your combat bonuses.
    This opens more opportunities to players.
    Only using what the player is wearing limits you a lot, e.g. you can only be wearing one weapon while if you like only stacking damage
    you can have in theory 28 weapons. Of course that wouldn’t be the smartest thing since you wouldn’t have any sustain.
    [/li]
    [li]While playing you gain gold, some items can increase the speed you gain gold. Monster and player kills will give you gold as well.
    [/li]
    [li]There are many big monsters that only can be beaten with multiple players, but gives big rewards as well.
    [/li]
    [li]Another thing for combat is the opportunity to duel a player wherever you are. The duel is save so you’ll just return to where you started the duel upon death or win.
    [/li]
    [li]And as last there will be team-minigames with objectives
    [/li]
    [/list]

The main things are done at this time,
items with bonuses are working, but I also want to add special effects to bring some more fun to the game,
as well as giving the player a reason to seriously think about what item to buy.

Shops have been programmed, npc managing has been finished as well and the base structures for
champions are done as well.

Media:

L9RCHYt.png765×496

CJQDHuK.png732×441
[/ul][/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: [RandQm] Forgotten Warriors - Revolution of gameplay
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Seems like many people like the lone system, though it was a piece of cake.
Here’s the code for it, feel free to rip it as long as you keep my credits on it.
You’ll obviously will have to change some things to fit with your server.

Loan class

[code=java]
package org.randqm.game.economy;

import org.randqm.game.mobs.players.Client;
import org.randqm.util.Constants;

/**

  • @Author: RandQm
  • @Project: Forgotten Warriors
  • @Date: 20th of April 2013
    */

public class Loan {

private Client c;

public Loan(final Client c) {
	this.c = c;
}

private int npcId;
private int value;

private int[] openLoans = new int[4]; //TODO: Save to character file


/*
 * Checks if the clicked id is a bank, if it is, it will start the conversation to get a loan.
 */
public void clickBank(int id, boolean isNpc) {
	npcId = 495;
	if (isNpc)
		npcId = id;
	if (isNpc) {
		for (int npc : Constants.BANKERS) {
			if (npc == id)
				c.getDialogueManager().dia(3);
		}
	} else {
		for (int object : Constants.BANK_OBJECTS) {
			if (object == id)
				c.getDialogueManager().dia(3);
		}
	}
}

/*
 * Handles opening a new loan.
 */
public void openLoan() {
	int loan = -1;
	for (int i = 1; i < openLoans.length; i ++) {
		if (openLoans[i] == 0) {
			loan = i;
			break;
		}
	}
	if (loan == -1) {
		System.out.println("[Loan] Player: "+c.playerName+" attemps to open more than 3 loans.");
		//TODO: write bug log
		return;
	}
	openLoans[loan] = value;
	c.getGoldManager().setGold(c.getGoldManager().getGold() + value);
	value = 0;
}

/*
 * Checks how many open loans the player has.
 */
public int getOpenLoans() {
	int count = 0;
	for (int i = 1; i < openLoans.length; i ++) {
		if (openLoans[i] > 0)
			count ++;
	}
	return count;
}


public int getNpcId() {
	return npcId;
}

public int getValue() {
	return value;
}

public void setValue(int value) {
	this.value = value;
}

}[/code]

Clicking buttons (for the options)

[code=java]package org.randqm.model.action;

import org.randqm.game.mobs.players.Client;

/**

  • @Author: RandQm
  • @Project: Forgotten Warriors
  • @Date: 20th of April 2013
    */

public class DialogueAction {

public static void choseDialogueOption (Client c) {
	switch (c.actionButtonId) {
	
	//2 option dialogue:
	
		//Dialogue Option 1
	case 9157:
		if (c.NpcDialogue == 3) { //Loan
			if (c.getLoan().getOpenLoans() >= 3)
				c.getDialogueManager().dia(2);
			else
				c.getDialogueManager().dia(4);
		}
		if (c.NpcDialogue == 7) { //Loan
			c.getLoan().openLoan();
			c.getDialogueManager().dia(9);
		}
		if (c.NpcDialogue == 10) //Loan
			c.getDialogueManager().dia(3);
		break;
		
		//Dialogue Option 2
	case 9158:
		if (c.NpcDialogue == 3) { //Loan
			//TODO: Information on loans
		}
		if (c.NpcDialogue == 7) //Loan
			c.getDialogueManager().dia(8);
		if (c.NpcDialogue == 10) //Loan
			c.getDialogueManager().dia(8);
		break;
		
		
	//4 option dialogue:
		
	case 32017: //Option 1
		break;
		
	case 32018: //Option 2
		break;
		
	case 32019: //Option 3
		break;
		
	case 32020: //Option 4
		break;
	
	//5 options dialogue:
	case 32029:
		if (c.NpcDialogue == 5) { //Loan
			c.getLoan().setValue(250);
			if (c.getGoldManager().atMaxGold(c.getLoan().getValue()))
				c.getDialogueManager().dia(11);
			else
				c.getDialogueManager().dia(6);
		}
		break;
	case 32030:
		if (c.NpcDialogue == 5) { //Loan
			c.getLoan().setValue(500);
			if (c.getGoldManager().atMaxGold(c.getLoan().getValue()))
				c.getDialogueManager().dia(11);
			else
				c.getDialogueManager().dia(6);
		}
		break;
	case 32031:
		if (c.NpcDialogue == 5) { //Loan
			c.getLoan().setValue(1000);
			if (c.getGoldManager().atMaxGold(c.getLoan().getValue()))
				c.getDialogueManager().dia(11);
			else
				c.getDialogueManager().dia(6);
		}
		break;
	case 32032:
		if (c.NpcDialogue == 5) { //Loan
			c.getLoan().setValue(2500);
			if (c.getGoldManager().atMaxGold(c.getLoan().getValue()))
				c.getDialogueManager().dia(11);
			else
				c.getDialogueManager().dia(6);
		}
		break;
	case 32033:
		if (c.NpcDialogue == 5) { //Loan
			c.getLoan().setValue(5000);
			if (c.getGoldManager().atMaxGold(c.getLoan().getValue()))
				c.getDialogueManager().dia(11);
			else
				c.getDialogueManager().dia(6);
		}
		break;
		
	}	
}

}[/code]

The dialogues (without information option since I didn’t finish that yet)

case 2: talk3("You can't have more than 3 loans open!", "Pay of one of your loans first in order", "to open a new one.", c.getLoan().getNpcId()); break; case 3: choice("Open a loan", "Information on loans"); break; case 4: talk("How much would you want to lend?", c.getLoan().getNpcId()); break; case 5: options5("250", "500", "1000", "2500", "5000"); break; case 6: talk2("Are you sure you want to lend "+c.getLoan().getValue()+"?", "You will have to pay it back at 10%", c.getLoan().getNpcId()); break; case 7: choice("Yes, I am sure.", "No, Thanks."); break; case 8: talk("Alright, see you another time sir.", c.getLoan().getNpcId()); break; case 9: talk2("Your gold has been added.", "Is there anything more I can do for you?", c.getLoan().getNpcId()); break; case 10: choice("Yes.", "No."); break; case 11: talk2("You can't open this loan because you", "will have more than the maximum possible gold.", c.getLoan().getNpcId()); break;

Read full topic

[quote=“hadlich4, post:29, topic:517734”][quote author=Cruel Truth link=topic=635996.msg4289818#msg4289818 date=1367033612]
should tell Amy she messed that model up … it’s missing certain areas
[/quote]

amy mirrored the objects in this model so she only made half of it i just copied it and added the second half for her the picture was tooken while it was mirrored that why it looks like its missing spots, i connected all the vertices. she didnt mess anything up.[quote author=RandQm link=topic=635996.msg4290096#msg4290096 date=1367079061]

lol. stole my idea of dueling anywhere. i already added that to my project not to hard to add really.

The everywhere duelling was already around in the beginning of rsps.
I don’t even know who you are or that you have a project. It’s not like it’s anything special
to complain about in the first place, takes like 15 minutes to add.
Also don’t advertise on my thread, have some respect god damned
[/quote]

1.just making a statement jeez really gotta take it that serious? and never said it was anything special also wasn’t complaining.
2. he said my project was unknown so i was telling him the name and development page. thank of it as if someone told you that your project was unknown and your working a lot on it and obviously not many people know about it you would tell them the name of your project as well so don’t get all pissy.[/quote]
Posting links, pictures and info is advertising, you could just have said, here’s my development with a link to the dev page
